long_description: You never know when you need a little extra carrying space. The Thule Pulse Alpine roof top cargo box hauls an assortment of big and little gear year-round. Carrying skis (5 - 6 pairs), poles, snowboards (2 - 3), tents and sleeping bags with ease, and frees up all kinds of trunk space no matter what you're heading out to do. Rugged construction with impact-resistant ABS plastic. Passenger-side opening provides easy access for loading and unloading. Can be mounted on square and round crossbars and most factory racks (see Fit List). Easy-grip mounting assembles quickly and easily attaches to car rack. The Thule Pulse Alpine roof box has a SecureLock feature that ensures cargo box is closed securely.
short_description: You never know when you need a little extra carrying space. The Thule Pulse Alpine roof top cargo box hauls an assortment of big and little gear year-round.
